pablofigueroa.description: I have been doing research in Virtual Reality for over 20 years, which includes the set of applications designed to create immersive experiences that seem real to the senses, especially the visual sense. Most of the theses I have directed and the projects I have developed are related to this topic.

viviangomez.description: I hold a Master‚Äôs degree in Systems and Computing Engineering with an emphasis on Visual Computing, and have over six years of experience in research and development of virtual reality solutions applied to training and learning, both in academia and in industry with the Colombian Navy and Ecopetrol. I am currently a faculty member at Universidad de los Andes and coordinator of the COLIVRI lab, where I advise research projects and teach courses on software development in teams and mobile applications, with an emphasis on design methodologies, human‚Äìcomputer interaction, and UI/UX design. My research focuses on extended realities for learning, training, and the creation of digital twins of physical spaces such as laboratories.

abelarismendy.description: Computer and Systems Engineering student @ Universidad de los Andes. Experience with React & React Native, TS, NextJS, and NestJS. Background in graphic design.

davidoviedo.display_name: David Alberto Oviedo De La Torre

karolsoler.description: Soy una Biomedical Engineering Researcher apasionada por la IA, el an√°lisis de datos, la investigaci√≥n e innovaci√≥n, y la f√≠sica m√©dica. Me considero una persona muy creativa y llena de energ√≠a para aprender cosas nuevas, siempre en b√∫squeda de herramientas y enfoques innovadores para transformar los desaf√≠os en oportunidades.

lizethbejarano.description: My name is Lizeth Bejarano and I am a Computer and Systems Engineering student at Universidad de Los Andes. I am very interested in AI, robotics and software development and I am involved in projects related to these topics.

anatrillos.description: I am a student of Art and Industrial Engineering. I am interested in 3D modeling and animation in the technological field.

davidalvarez.description: David Alvarez's main area of scientific activity is Operations Research and Computer Science. Within Operations Research he focuses on the modeling, solution and application of problems related to supply chain management, manufacturing and production, logistics and transportation, as well as problems of material cutting, personnel hiring, goods packaging, vehicle routing, among others. From a technical point of view, David's research focuses on the development of specialized software, combining exact and approximate optimization methods and the application of artificial intelligence techniques, for the control of physical mechanisms to solve real industrial problems.

jesussantana.description: Hi, I'm an Electronics Engineering student. I am part of the SinfonIA student initiative, where I focus on the Speech area. I am passionate about technology, especially robotics and control systems, and enjoy collaborating with my peers on exciting projects.

santiagorodriguez.description: I am a 20 year old student of Computer and Systems Engineering, temporarily living in Mexico. I consider myself a curious person and always looking to explore new horizons, especially in the field of art and technology. As a software developer, I specialize in Artificial Intelligence implementations and enjoy applying new technologies in projects that capture my interest.

danielfuentes.description: I'm Daniel, I'm a gymrat. I'm also a systems engineer and I believe in trial and error, failure is very important to improve. If you don't fail you don't learn.

mariaestupinan.description: Hi! I'm Paula, a systems engineering student with a great passion for everything related to art and computer science. Currently, I'm part of initiatives that allow me to expand my horizons and develop my creativity to the fullest ;)

juanmontenegro.description: Electronic engineering and systems engineering student, passionate about technology, robotics and software and hardware development.

emiliozea.description: I am a 5th semester student of Computer and Systems Engineering, with great interest in understanding the functioning of Artificial Intelligence models, information technologies, and their application and evolution in various contexts. I am also passionate about sports and enjoy listening to music, finding in both activities that complement my personal and professional development.

anahernandez.description: I'm Ana Mar√≠a, a Computer and Systems Engineering student. I am passionate about music and I am interested in projects that combine programming with creativity.

mariabarrios.description: Studying BSc in Architecture and Design, and academic option in Art History. Vivero Virtual assistant at Uniandes.

guillermovillalba.description: Studying systems engineering and digital narratives. Research assistant at Vivero Virtual Uniandes since September 2024.

nicolasrincon.description: I consider myself a curious, proactive and disciplined person. I am always fully dedicated to what I do and I strive to achieve every goal I set for myself with excellence and in an ethical and professional manner. I am also passionate about learning new things, whether related to academic subjects or curious facts. My greatest aspiration is to continue learning and growing as a person so that my knowledge is useful to help many people. Since this semester I am part of the SinfonIA manipulation tool, through which I hope to learn and contribute to the development of social robotics.

claycharry.description:
Clay is a Computer and Systems Engineering student at Uniandes. Since he was a child, he has been very interested in the functioning of the brain and human behavior. Based on this and seeing the potential of technology to improve the world with innovative bets, he became deeply interested in artificial intelligence. 

In the past, Clay has been part of initiatives such as:- Student Council of Systems and Computer Engineering (Uniandes)
- Polaris Project (Arex Costa Rica)
- AMBROSPACE (Joint Venture)

- Now, after a brief journey in the aerospace industry and his experience as a founder, he has decided to resume his interest in AI. In the second half of 2024 he joined SinfonIA as a member of the 'Perception' team where he will contribute mainly in the area of visual computing.

davidcuevas.bio: Undergraduate Student - SinfonIA | Colivri lab assitant
davidcuevas.description: I am a Systems Engineering student and since 2022-2 and currently led SinfonIA Uniandes. I work with ROS and Python, creating complex tasks and improving natural language processing for the Pepper robot. I also develop graphical interfaces that facilitate the interaction between the robot and the users.

juanortega.description: I am a Systems and Computing Engineering student in my last semester. I have been working with Universidad de los Andes and the Department of Systems and Computing Engineering since 2022, in Scouting and Promotion. I am interested in Artificial Intelligence and Cybersecurity. I am doing my degree project using AI technologies with the Colombian Aerospace Force. I like dogs and electronic music. üéµü§ñ

juanguevara.description: I am a System and Computer Engineering student at Los Andes University in Bogot√°, Colombia, with a strong foundation in graph theory, linear algebra, vector calculus, programming, and artificial intelligence. Currently, I serve as the Perception Leader at SinfonIA Uniandes, where I excel in team leadership and enjoy tackling complex challenges. My main interests lie in graph theory and AI, and I am driven by a passion for discovering innovative solutions to improve modern technology. Outside of academics, I engage in competitive programming and enjoy cycling as a personal pursuit.

alexandragutierrez.description: I am Alexandra and I study Law in the seventh semester. I believe it is important to have different perspectives on things, as this allows you to better understand the situation you want to resolve.

simoncalderon.description: My name is Sim√≥n Calder√≥n, a Systems and Computing Engineering student at Universidad de los Andes and leader of the Speech area in *SinfonIA*, our university‚Äôs social robotics research group. I started programming at 15 with Python and pandas, and now guide research and development efforts focused on speech technologies. I‚Äôve led projects integrating speech recognition and synthesis in human-robot interaction, aiming to make communication with robots more natural and accessible. Notable achievements include second place at the Devsavant Hackathon, being a finalist at CodeFest AD Astra 2024, and earning a full scholarship at Colombia‚Äôs top university.

danielocampo.description: Hola! Soy estudiante de tercer semestre de pregrado en Ingenieria de Sistemas y Computaci√≥n. Siempre tuve mucho inter√©s en el desarrollo de aplicaciones y juegos, por lo que me gust√≥ mucho la idea de trabajar en proyectos de realidad virtual con Oasis en el lab Colivri. Por ahora a√∫n tengo mucho que aprender, pero estoy emocionado para trabajar en este espacio.

lucasgandara.bio: Estudiante de maestria - Proyecto de Grado
lucasgandara.description: Estudiante de ultimo semestre de MISIS, mi proyecto de grado se enfoca en Aprendizaje por refuerzo profundo aplicado a robots moviles.

paulpaffen.description: Estoy actualmente en sexto semestres de ingenier√≠a de sistemas, desde peque√±o siempre me intereso todos los temas de Xr, lo que me motivo a unirme a osasis para poder tambi√©n desarrollar en este campo, actualmente estoy desempe√±ando un rol de desarrallodor Xr ayudando ya sea en programar alguna mec√°nica del proyecto o modelando alg√∫n objecto.

leffertrochez.description:
I am Leffer Trochez, a Master's student in Electronic and Computer Engineering at the Universidad de los Andes. Since I had my first approach with robotics, I knew this was my path. I am passionate about hardware design, programming and the development of intelligent systems that can interact with the world autonomously.

During my undergrad, I created DuqueXII, a static robot designed to help mitigate domestic accidents in early childhood through sensorics and image analysis. Today I am still working on its evolution towards a mobile version, with the goal of taking its functionality even further. Being part of the Colivri lab has been and will be an incredible experience. Here I have the opportunity to work with the Unitree G1 EDU humanoid robot, exploring the world of spatial control and navigation. My master thesis will focus on the analysis of different control algorithms to improve its mobility and autonomy. Through my research and development, I aspire to contribute valuable knowledge to the university and the scientific community, promoting new solutions that bring robotics to more people and solve real problems.

davidburgos.bio: Computer and Systems Engineering student @ Uniandes
